reviews_data.review_text: Low quality products

Been several times so I feel like I can say i gave a fair chance. Never loved the overly roasted taste of their coffee, but go because it's so close to where I live.

Today I went in with my two girls and yes there were a lot of people there but our drinks took 30 minutes. We saw multiple people come after us and get their drinks. We had to ask three times about our drinks because I was sure they got lost it was that ridiculous. When we did get them (ice coffee and kids steamer) they were not correct. And the steamer was so hot my daughter couldn't even drink it.

Service was so disappointing. Only reason giving two not one star is because I feel bad for the owner since they likely don't know this is going down.

Very delicious lavanda coffee ! The food I didn't tried yet.
The atmosphere is ok,pretty quiet and you can work on your computer there if you want.
Outside is plenty of parking lots.
The staff is nice.
I do recommend this place.
Coffee was good   Macaroons tasted freezer burnt.

What a cute coffee shop.  We stopped there after the park today and we were pleasantly surprised how good the coffee tasted.  It was pretty empty at the time we visited and received excellent service right away.

My coffee came with the cutest design and it certainly brightened up my day.
Very yummy oat milk latte!

This is my favorite coffee shop, but their staff at the Cornelius location are the rudest of any restaurant I've ever been to!! I always say hello and they never smile or respond. I say thank you when I get my coffee or food and again zero response. So unprofessional and rude. The Huntersville location is not like this and their staff is very nice. I quit tipping this location because of the terrible service. If it wasn't for the good coffee and food I would never go again. Unacceptable.
Loved the lavender coffee
Great place to go for a short business meeting.
Great coffee, perfect for chatting!

Their coffee is genuinely awesome. A lot of flavor! Love the options for how you want it brewed as well. I do wish they had a name or number system for the orders though, as I saw people grabbing other people's drinks that had been waiting for a while (clearly ordered same thing). I'm sure this is only an issue when they're pretty busy.
The Veggie melt was delicious, and bigger than what I was expecting. My husband liked the Good Morning croissant. The coffee is good. Great atmosphere.
Great experience every time i come there, the coffee is superb and I'd like to give a special shout out to one of baristas. Kim had impeccable customer service, and did everything in a timely manner.

I come here often, usually the huntersville location. But I want to write the review with hopes management sees my little gripe. I'm happy to sit in your pleasant space and enjoy your tasty (and expensive) coffee. But when I order espresso (or anything else) I don't want a single use disposable cup. This really irks me. Multiple times even after I specify I want it "for here" I'm served disposable containers. It kills the taste, the ambiance, increases waste and certainly tips the scale against the price point. This isn't Starbucks. If you're competing for takeout coffee customers use a drive thru.
Nice Classic Machiatto!!!The space is big and it even includes a spare room for meetings!!
Atmosphere was dead, fridge at the front was noticeably loud, and the barista had an AirPod in and wasn't too friendly.
This is for the one off Jetton Road, near CVS. Good coffee & coffee drinks, kind, friendly servers. Would like more of the comfortable sofas & group seating.
Amazing place with good tea but I wish that they would bring back the Sakura rose tea it was literally the best

Great place to meet up with friends or get some remote work done. I've been here many times.  They have indoor and outdoor seating options as well as a group meeting room, which is first come, first serve.   Additionally, they have gluten-free food options! I love their almond milk latte.
Great place to work from! Lots of tables

Great place to meet clients or friends for a masterfully crafted drink or a simple cup of coffee. I also love their tea selections. I've been to many of the Waterbeans around the Charlotte metro same great quality.
Quaint lil spot, very nice and the people were nice.  Had a blast at cars and coffee!
Great coffee spot with different brewing methods. Flights available for serious coffee drinkers.
My favorite spot to do computer work at. I'm not a coffee drinker so I really like WB because of the huge selection of loose leaf teas.... And the croissant sammies..

I stopped in for a cup of coffee and some internet on a Sunday morning. The drip brew was good and I felt comfortable in there. A few other people, but plenty of seating. I would go back to try some lattes.

Tried the Pumpkin Spice swirl latte - SO good. I had it unsweetened and it was amazing. Great atmosphere. I came in during a little midday rush. Only one girl working and she handled the crowd really well to be the only one behind the counter! I will be back for sure.
This place is great! The baristas are very knowledgeable, the coffee is great & they have a large selection of teas.

For the coffee nerd.

The staff is very kind and knowledgeable. They offer so many ways to prepare coffee that could really make this place more of an "experience" if you have the time (give Siphon coffee a shot).
Mmmmmm so yummy. For all your coffee and breakfast needs, go here.
Great coffee and service!

Enjoying a coffee frappe on a hot day in Cornelius at Waterbean. Serene decor, quiet, comfortable (AC not freezing cold like so many places), nice background music that's not too loud like some coffee shops, plus secure wifi. I'm like Goldilocks, everything is just right.
This place should be busier than it is. Great little set up and great coffee.

I ordered the new Paradise iced latte this past Saturday and it was absolutely amazing. It was beautiful and all the flavors were balanced and I immediately knew I would be in the very next day for another one. Unfortunately the next day it was just not made correctly and I could tell immediately when I picked up my order just by looking it , I just didn't have the heart to say anything. It was an honest mistake. It looked like a dark purple mess and tasted like pure syrup I went home and added my own coffee and more milk. Sharing this in hopes its made correctly the next time because it was truly amazing. Below are the photos. Will be back again though.

Only waterbean location in Charlotte area that does not allow dogs.  Poor service.  No one at counter told me there was an outside area or offer any assistance or direction.  First time I walked into this location.  Not friendly.
Please learn to make a decent espresso or change the name to Waterdown Coffee
Great coffee! Try the gluten free breakfast cookies!
Friendly atmosphere, great coffee selection. Perfect meeting place.
Been here a few times now. Trying their new Halloween themed drinks today. The flavors are amazing and all the ladies are as wonderful as the coffee.

The drink I got was delish. I asked the barista for a coffee drink that is creamy and yummy. She put surprise flavors in it. I'm not sure what it was, but she nailed it. Friendly service, and a clean & inviting atmosphere.

I door dash. So this is the first time I've been to this store for a pick up. As soon a si walk in the door the young behind the counter says"ugh do you a mask" before I could say anything. Then immediately says what ever dash ur here to get we don't have we already told them that. Before I even said anything or what I was thee to pick up. Which I had to order being a red card order.  So I walk outside grab my mask come back inside I make her look at the order she's like oh we have that. It was a mocha.  So I wait and get my order to deliver and she seemed alittle lost at that point prob embarrassed after being rude before I even said anything.  I personally will never go in there to buy myself anything. Good luck to ty rest of the dashers having to pick up orders there
One of my favorite spots for coffee and business meetings

The girl behind the counter sweet, engaging
Made me a cold Carmel Machiatto
Yummy.
Perfection
Lattes were sumptuous and delicious. Staff was great and very friendly.

Nice atmosphere and good size so people could spread out. I got a frappe which I'll admit was my mistake for getting at a nice looking coffee shop. Let's just say I've had better frappe's at McDonald's.  No flavor except for the milk and cream. So hopefully their actual coffee is better, just don't get the frappe.
Great coffee, food, and vibe.
Very good coffee. Reasonably priced

They don't finish making your order before starting another. You will have to remind them to finish your drinks if its more than 1 item. The creme brulee latte is bad. Macaroons taste like a refrigerator.
Definitely get some quality coffee here
Friendly service, comfortable atmosphere, and great coffee!
Overpriced, coffee is brassy tasting and staff is disinterested
It was closed. Who closes at 6 and on the dot.

Amazing!!!
Love the blends of dark roast coffee they have...
It's always phenomenal
What's not to love about coffee?
Awesome staff and great cappuccino!
Very friendly staff. My husband said the coffee was very good. I bought some macaroons as a gift and the recipient said they were delicious.
Best coffee in the area!
Great coffee, European strength, macaroons were ok
Absolutely wonderful. I came to get some boba with my bff and the ladies who serves us were so patient and polite.
very nice and welcoming people!
Good service and ambience
Friendly staff, quality coffee, great selection
The breakfast sandwich is incredible, especially with their signature sauce. The coffee selection is second to none.
Loved this new coffee shop. Great atmosphere. Coffee is really good and fresh. Plus the sweets are an added bonus

Decided to finally stop in here after way too long, treated myself to their "Best Cup" and was very pleased that I did - I might not be able to get it every time I'm in but I'll certainly be tempted to. The barista was kind and knowledgeable, a pleasure to speak with. I'll definitely be back!
Delicious food. Awesome plum green tea. And the environment was relaxed and had many different areas to sit.
This place is always clean and coffee to perfection! Love meeting my clients there.
Good coffee but had a smell of pot inside.
Great local alternative to Starbucks. Great coffee competitively priced.
waitingbrealy long
The shop is clean, the staff is nice and accommodating. The coffee is very yummy. The baked goods are delicious.
Great place
Great coffee. They give you cute little chocolate cover beans on top of your to go cup too!
Cute store. Good coffee. Reasonable prices.
Nice decor and great coffee and tea

Really nice and chill ambiance. Clean, modern, comfortable with hip, low-lecel relaxing music. Employees very friendly and knowledgeable with helping you make your selection. I went with the iced Ginger Peach tea with a Turkey (+egg) croissant. MuchO yuM!
.
Thank you, Waterbean Coffee.
Good coffee, duh.
Nice coffee and people.
Love coming here for their bubble tea! They're breakfast sandwiches and coffee are awesome, too.
Poor coffee and service
Like one of the best coffee shops I've ever been too. I in worked corporate coffee for 11 years and Water Bean is

The best coffee I've ever had and macroons and customer service! Seriously love this place! Annie is an amazing barista and comes up with the best drinks (oat milk with 1 pump of coconut syrup), do yourself a favor and get it with a creme brulee macaroon. Straight up heaven!
Better than Starbucks
They have tons of great tea to choose from.  Nice atmosphere and friendly service
Great place!! Tried something new and was pleasantly pleased!! Coffee shops like this are sweet gems I LOVE to find. Worth checking out!!
Love their hazelnut latte!
Service is great! Friendly staff. Coffee ok.
Great place to relax & have a wonderful cup of coffee.
This is a nice laid back coffee shop, better than Starbucks. I meet with friends in a separate room where we can talk without being disturbed.
Great little place for a quick meeting and a coffee.
I love the atmosphere and the coffee is great.
Great coffee and non coffee choices. Great service.

Fun, relaxing coffee shop with tasty snacks.  Comfortable chairs, charging stations and free wi-fi make this a go to place.  After a relaxing time you can stop me DC t door at the Wine Shop for a take home or wine tasting.
Always a treat... Love the variety of different coffees.
Great little space with some truly inspired coffee and tea drinks. The traditional pour overs from Vietnam are amazing. Loving it!

The coffee and service were excellent. The coffee shop is large and easy to find seating. In good weather there is seating outside. It appears to be a popular place. We were passing through on the way to South Carolina. Enjoyed the stop and would recommend the coffee shop

Delicious coffees and a wonderful assortment of tea. Probably the best assortment of tea at any coffee shop I've been to in the area. Staff is always nice. It can be very crowded in the mornings even though they have a ton of seating.

Super fresh. Very clean. Great employees.
Best coffee ever!!!
Great coffee, smoothies, and a welcoming environment to meet other business owners or catch up on some work.
Coffee and atmosphere are excellent.  The cappuccinos are fun sized so order the largest size.
Nice, quiet place to visit.
Great atmosphere! Love the berry tea either hot or cold. They do a car show in the parking lot Saturday mornings. Not sure the frequency on that. They also have a meeting room you can use there.
Very clean and cozy, great teas and a place to meet with friends to chat.
Clean and quick! Great selection of Teas.
Great coffee, but more importantly an excellent place to do work. Quiet, excellent wifi and friendly/polite staff.
So many selections, great music and friendly service. What more can you expect from a coffee shop.
Good coffee spot with Honey & Cinnamon. The way i drink mine.
Very pleasant place, cool decor and tables, even if coffee is a bit pricey!
Very friendly baristas and warm atmosphere. Love the outdoor space to sit, work, and enjoy coffee!
Good coffee and service
The waterbean in Cornelius is by far the best one I've been to.
Good coffee, great service.
Terrific place. The coffee, the ambiance, the service...it's all good.

Great little coffee shop, I go here every month for Cars and Coffee Cornelius and enjoy grabbing a hot drink and walking around to look at all of the amazing cars that show up every second Saturday of the month.
Great coffee and a cool hangout spot. The volcano coffee is very good. I usually get a Volcano, macaroon, and a regular coffee to go.
Best coffee period
Great local coffee spot!
Go here all the time, the staff is very nice the product is great and delicious. Not too sure about the atmosphere created by the clientele, wish I could go to a coffee shop where people smile
Delicious coffee! The Volcano is amazing and the Macarons are perfect.
Pineapple tea was wonderful
The volcano was awesome! Super nice staff and place to hang out in general
Delicious coffee!  Their Sizzlewich is gluten free.
This place is so cozy and bright!
Love it, very welcoming, lots of places to sit and relax inside and out. Great cup of coffee.
Coffee, teas and macaroons are wonderful!

Great coffee, always fresh!! Second cup is free. The patio outside is quiet and comfortable. It is a family business, so the staff is always friendly. They completely stand above the chain coffee shop competitors.
Cozy coffee shop with good drinks and service. Pastries are delicious and ambient is very warmth and quiet. Perfect to meet friends or do some work while sipping your favorite beverage.
Nice coffee shop. Better coffee than S-bucks. Polite staff and tasty pastries. Lots of clean and pleasant seating.
ethiopian was very good, service excellent, this location closes a bit on the early side
The best chai latte
Nice
People are amazing! Very good atmosphere and an amazing place to meet and make friends. Love the coffees, be sure to order the 'KEN'
Great place for a cup of coffee!
Very nice place to hang out with friends and enjoy an amazing cup of coffee!
Amazing coffee!
Such a great coffee shop and awesome location. I would highly recommend their cold brew coffee, simply amazing. Also, it is great location for meetings or to simply get your work done
Like the coffee and ambience

One of my favorites to spend a morning or afternoon working outside of the office.  It is a good place to meet people but is not as intimate as a few other coffee shops in the area.  If you are looking for big open space, then this is perfect.

They have fantastic coffee, espresso, tea selections.  If you order an espresso drink, you can choose from 4 different espresso options.  I love #4!  The pour over coffee may be my favorite pure option.  No cream or sugar needed with this process because the coffee is so great.  I've also tried the chia tea and regular drip coffee which were both good but the other items I mentioned were my favorites.  The lattes were super creamy and not too sweet.  They even have almond milk.

They take bitcoin, if you like to pay that way.  I haven't tried their sandwiches yet, but I did split my two waffle plate with a friend one time and they were great.

I like this spot for working meetings (good wifi) and working alone.  Seating outside too.  If you see me there, say hi!
Love this place
Very nice place to sit and relax and enjoy a great cup of coffee.
Great place to relax with a wonderful cup of coffee.
Fantastic coffee. Great espresso based drinks.
Great place to stop and grab a quiet corner to get some work done between meetings.
Love this place! Always super clean, great variety and wonderful ambiance!
Great coffee and very good treats.  Car show every second Saturday is a great time
They accept Bitcoin and hot chocolate is great.
Great place for me to meet clients!
Great staff, knowledgeable and accommodating! Coffee is wonderful environment is peaceful. Look forward to trying something new next time. There will be many next times.
This place has awesome coffee and pastries. You should definitely try it.
Good service

Great local coffee shop centered in Cornelius. Good well make coffee and a nice classy atmosphere.

Staff always super friendly
Great coffee
Have your option of cold brew, pour over, french press, etc. They really do coffee right. Great atmosphere inside and large outside patio.
Great coffee, and unique atmosphere.
awesome!
a great place to get good coffee. pleasant staff with a calm atmosphere. there are even a few craft beers on tap!
I can finally buy coffee with Bitcoin! Best coffee, tea and employees around.
Great coffee, terrific staff and uber comfortable! It's my new favorite place to go!
I've been going to Waterbean all the time. Along with a great ambiance, and mind blowing coffee, I can get work done on the free Wi-Fi and treat myself too!
This place is immaculate and the coffee is wonderful! Great atmosphere!

Excellent selection of Teas' and Coffees. Extremely peaceful place - perfect to get some work done. Comfortable seating, free wifi and ample parking.
All topped with the kind of quiet and friendly atmosphere you just won't get at starbucks.

Coffee tastes amazing! Owner is very friendly and is willing to go out of his way to make sure, I feel welcome. The ambient at Waterbean is unlike any other. You feel like you in a library but you can talk as loud as you want. Most importantly, this place is extremely clean and once again the coffee is really amazing!
Outstanding!  Very modern coffee shop with ample room and excellent coffee.  Very friendly staff.  Can't wait to go back.
